body: Tagged as _newbie_ because you can fix this by grepping for deprecation and removing code!
I did this for play-ebean if someone can review the pending PRs there: https://github.com/playframework/play-ebean/pulls

issue.title: Remove play.api.Plugin etc.

repository.name: playframework
repository.description: The Community Maintained High Velocity Web Framework For Java and Scala.

issue.body:
Remove play.api.Plugin, as part of on-going work for #5309.

Because GlobalSettings depends on a Plugin, there's also some work to directly address GlobalSettings as an application dependency.  GlobalSettings was not previously deprecated, so that is also done here, and a GlobalSettings.Deprecated type is added so that deprecation warnings can be avoided on an internal Play build.

Also removed a couple of `@Deprecated` global methods while I was at it. 

Note that the JavaPlugins.md has been replaced with "TODO" -- I think the page should point to https://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.4.x/PluginsToModules instead.

issue.title: Remove internal references to deprecated play.api.Play.* methods

repository.name: playframework
repository.description: The Community Maintained High Velocity Web Framework For Java and Scala.

issue.body:
Ongoing work for #5309.  This takes out the deprecated methods in play.api.Play (which mostly delegate to application).

There's a fair bit of code that goes straight to Play.current.injector etc, but removing current is out of scope.

issue.title: Deprecate play.GlobalSettings

repository.name: playframework
repository.description: The Community Maintained High Velocity Web Framework For Java and Scala.

issue.body: Ongoing work for #5309.  Deprecates the Java version of `play.GlobalSettings` -- missed this in https://github.com/playframework/playframework/pull/5339 -- and removed some Deprecated methods in `play.GlobalSettings`.

issue.title: Remove deprecated methods from Configuration

repository.name: playframework
repository.description: The Community Maintained High Velocity Web Framework For Java and Scala.

issue.body:
Remove a load method from `play.api.Configuration`, as part of on-going work for #5309.

Lower in priority than #5323

issue.title: Remove IterateeExeption

repository.name: playframework
repository.description: The Community Maintained High Velocity Web Framework For Java and Scala.

issue.body:
Remove IterateeExeption, as part of on-going work for #5309.

Might possibly conflict with https://github.com/playframework/playframework/pull/5323 in which case 5323 takes precedence.
